hw_api_reason->type

(PHP 4, PHP 5 < 5.2.0, PECL hwapi CVS)

hw_api_reason->type — Returns type of reason

Description

hw_api_reason
HW_API_Reason type ( void )

Returns the type of a reason.

Return Values

Returns an instance of HW_API_Reason.
